author: sujonali1819

content: Blackjack.fun is an online crypto casino platform that provides both in-house and partner games. We accept various cryptocurrencies. Blackjack.fun has been operating since 2018. With updates and improvements every week since, the platform aims to compete with older, bigger sites. Blackjack.fun's greatest achievement is its community. The members can get involved in the functionality of the platform, they can bring improvements, change various aspects of the experience, and even suggest games. All these are meant to provide their members with a unique experience, an honest, transparent, and safe approach, and a place shaped based on their perspective.We are looking for some telegram users who will post our news in other telegram gaming groups. We will pay $1/post and a max of 2 posts.        Rules and RequrementsYou must join in this group https://t.me/Blackjack_fun_VIPBrand-new accounts are not allowed.Alternative accounts are not acceptedMax 2 telegram posts per userYou can not post in the same group where someone already posted.You must have to share in the gambling gaming-related telegram groupNo payment if the group is not gambling gaming related.You must use the post format from below.You can not delete the post that you will do for this campaign in at least 1 monthIf a DT tags you for a legitimate reason you can not participate in this campaignIf you don't follow the requirements you will not get paid.I have the right to stop the campaign any time we want.Payment$2 worth of BTC will be credited to your bitcoin wallet for 2 telegram group postTelegram post FormatCode:Blackjack.fun Is giving rewards to all VIP´s No matter the platform you are on. We value and appreciate our esteemed VIPs. That's why we offer one-of-a-kind VIP Rewards for Elite players. No matter the platform you are on. Get in touch with us to learn more about this exceptional program. We look forward to hearing from you.Rewards will depend on your VIP rank. You will get a cash bonus amount according to your wagered amount.Cash bonus5$ for 250k-$2.5M wagered10$ for 2.5M-$25M wagered30$ for $25M+ wageredHow to claim?- Enter the username and VIP rank of the casino where you are playing- A moderator to give your the following instruction- Bonus prize will be credited in your account instantlyTerms & Conditions: Wager requirement x20 and max win $100 Alternative accounts will get banned. Contact us and join our exclusive telegram group for more information: https://t.me/Blackjack_fun_VIPYou must have to add an image from below https://i.imgur.com/FnzY3LF.png       Telegram Group Post preview must be like this                     How to ApplyCode:Your bitcointalk profile link:Your telegram profile: Telegram group post link 1: Telegram group post link 2: Your correct BTC Address:How to Submit workPlease follow all requirements, share the post in the gambling gaming-related telegram group, and submit the task by using this form.https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSfDfRN1dgOot9aMUXjqx9QfPuxJ3ko9Y8aT_JL5LHdBxEaqIA/viewformSpreadsheethttps://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/12TPFQXUzsdTtjdcdHJx6NcnkmfqhNd5wYX1PZo02bzE/edit?usp=sharing
